t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (a, b, c) = map(int, input().split())
    maxi = max(a, b, c)
    sumi = a + b + c
    print('YES') if sumi - maxi == maxi else print('NO')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (a, b, c) = map(int, input().split())
    sum = a + b + c
    maxi = max(a, b, c)
    print('YES') if sum - maxi == maxi else print('NO')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (a, b, c) = map(int, input().split())
    l = []
    l.append(a)
    l.append(b)
    l.append(c)
    l.sort()
    if l[0] + l[1] == l[2]:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

for i in range(0, int(input())):
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    m = max(l)
    s = sum(l)
    print('YES') if s - m == m else print('NO')

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (A, B, C) = map(int, input().split())
    print('YES') if A == B + C or B == A + C or C == A + B else print('NO')

    sumi = a + b + c
    print('YES') if sumi - maxi == maxi else print('NO')
